thread.title: Ghanaian midfielder Donsah joins fight against racism in Italian football
thread.title_full: Ghanaian midfielder Donsah joins fight against racism in Italian football

title: Ghanaian midfielder Donsah joins fight against racism in Italian football
text:
Sports News | 5 October 2015 09:10 CET Ghanaian midfielder Donsah joins fight against racism in Italian football - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
In a sport where racism is widespread, it was least surprising to see young Ghanaian international, Godfred Donsah take the lead role in the fight against racism in football. 
Widespread racism has given European football a black eye recent times, with Ghanaians players also falling victims to racial attacks from fans. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
